description: Bentley Motors was founded by Walter Owen (W.O.) Bentley on July 10, 1919. The company is renowned globally for creating luxury cars with an unrivaled blend of performance, craftsmanship, and premium materials. Bentley began racing at the 24 Hours of Le Mans just two years after its founding. Since 1998, Bentley has been owned by Volkswagen AG and is headquartered in Crewe, England.
